page.title: 10LIFESTYLES IN TOFTWOOD
page.content: People felt that more playing area facilities ought to be provided for children. Almost all homes with children had either a computer or a video and on average the children watch 4 hours of television each day. Several people complained about the lack of facilities in Toftwood and they had to travel 2 miles into Dereham for everything they needed. Most households had a car, which is just as well as there is a very infrequent bus service to Toftwood. The old people were the ones who complained most about the lack of shops and the problems of transport. Some of them seemed lonely and kept us talking for a long time. Most people seemed to like living in Toftwood.
